attributes.action: Change NHS break in service policy to a reasonable period of time.
attributes.additional_details: The current break in service policy only covers 1-week. This is highly unreasonable, as it doesnt afford time for relocation, times between trust inductions, or any reasonable reason leading to a gap between NHS jobs. Moving to a 1-month break in service policy would be more reasonable and protect those facing redundancy from missing out on earning compensation.
attributes.background: Change the NHS break in service policy to be 1 month instead of 1 week. This provides protection for those changing jobs between contracts/jobs within the NHS.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about NHS break in service policies are a matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
